wordpressPost.title: Janelle Monáe at Øya 7th of August
wordpressPost.content:
It is with great excitement we welcome Janelle Monáe back to Oslo and Øya. She will play Thursday 7th of August. Day tickets and week passes are on sale now

JANELLE MONÁE (US)
Janelle Monáe from Kansas City is coming to Øya this summer. She has previously played our festival in 2008 and 2011. The concert in 2008 was her first ever outside the US, and she was the great surprise of that year’s line-up. In 2011, her debut album The ArchAndroid was out and thousands showed up for one of the greatest hours in Øya history. In August she will play our main stage, something she deserves after the successful album The Electric Lady. The album was released last year, and peaked at number five on the US album chart.

“What a wild and wonderful listening experience this is” The Daily Telegraph wrote in their review of The Electric Lady. They also stated: “Now this dazzling, daring, psychedelic funk pop opus puts Monáe firmly in the front rank of 21st-century stars”.

Janelle Monáe is considered a future superstar by many. We promise you a fantastic party when Janelle walks out on stage in Tøyenparken. Whether you like soul, classic or new RnB, good pop or just moving your body to good music, she is exactly what you want to see and hear.

http://www.jmonae.com/

photo Marc Baptiste

messages.newsletter.consentText:
Øyafestivalen sender ut nyhetsbrev cirka 3-4 ganger per måned via
    e-post. Make AS er databehandler for nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen
    lagres i en egen database, deles ikke med andre og slettes når du
    sier opp abonnementet ved å melde deg av via lenken nederst i
    nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen slettes også om vi får tilbakemelding
    om at den ikke er aktiv.
